abstract.t: Some of the messages described in [I-D.ietf-mif-api-extension] may rely on functionalties provided by lower layers. The IEEE 802.21 specification defines an abstraction of lower layer functions that can be useful for the MIF-API. This document provides an overview of the 802.21 specification and enumerates a subset of functions that can be used in the context of the MIF API to interact with lower layers.
